activities: Janssen Supply Group, LLC may receive personal information about employees, research subjects, patients, investigators and staff, service providers and business partners, health care professionals, suppliers, users of our products and services, and industry experts, and process this information to support the company's human resource activities and to support clinical research adverse event /complaint handling activities.
